getQueryStringComparatorExpressions

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get all available comparators
getQueryStringLogicalComparators

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get boolean logical comparators
queryStringCompare

  • Given configure clause

  • Select comparator operator based on clause operator, execute it and return result.
validateQueryStringByType

  • Configure specification builder on type and query string

  • Try building query string

  • Store all occurred error to array and return it
saveDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return id of discount entity in persistence.
updateDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create/update voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return bool if discount entity was persisted
getHydratedDiscountConfiguratorByIdDiscount

  • Read idDiscount from persistence

  • Hydrate data from entities to DiscountConfiguratorTransfer

  • return DiscountConfiguratorTransfer
toggleDiscountVisibility

  • Find discount entity

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Persist
saveVoucherCodes

  • Find discount to which voucherCodes have to be generated

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Create pool if not created yet.

  • Using voucher engine generate voucherCodes by provided configuration from DiscountVoucherTransfer

  • Persist code with reference to current discount

  • Return VoucherCreateInfoTransfer with error or success messages if there was any
calculatePercentage

  • Loops over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sums each amount to to total

  • Rounds up cent fraction for total discount amount.

  • Returns total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculatePercentageDiscount

  • Loops over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sums each amount to to total

  • Rounds up cent fraction for total discount amount.

  • Returns total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculateFixed

  • Returns amount passed as parameter

  • Returns 0 if negative number is given
calculateFixedDiscount

  • Returns amount passed as parameter

  • Returns 0 if negative number is given
distributeAmount

  • Loops over each DiscountableItemTransfer and calculate each item price amount share from current discount total, for single item.

  • Calculates floating point error and store it for later item, add it to next item.

  • Stores item price share amount into DiscountableItemTransfer::originalItemCalculatedDiscounts array object reference. Points to original item.
releaseUsedVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Reduce voucher number of uses property by 1 to indicate it's not used/released.
useVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes finds all voucher entities with counter

  • Increments voucher number of uses property by 1.
saveOrderDiscounts

  • Loops over all quote items, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • Loops over all quote expenses, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • If there is voucher codes marks them as already used by incrementing number of uses.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
isSatisfiedBy

  • Make decision on given Quote or Item transfer.

  • Use \Spryker\Zed\Discount\Business\QueryString\ComparatorOperatorsInterface to compare item value with ClauseTransfer.

  • Returns false when not matching.
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DecisionRulePluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)
collect

  • Collect items to which discount have to be applied, ClauseTransfer holds query string parameters,

  • Use \Spryker\Zed\Discount\Business\QueryString\ComparatorOperatorsInterface to compare item value with ClauseTransfer.

  • Returns array of discountable items with reference to original CalculatedDiscountTransfer, which is modified by reference by distributor.
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​CollectorPluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountRuleWithAttributesPluginInterface.php getAttributeTypes

  • Special rule type which allows expand available value list for decision or collector.

  • For example product attributes. Uses one decision rules where available attributes will be provided by getAttributeTypes.

  • So you can filter by attribute.color = 'red' or attribute.brand = 'nike'. With same decision rule.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountAmountCalculatorPluginInterface.php calculateDiscount

  • Calculate discount amount on given discountable items, which are collected by configured Collectors.

  • The discount amount is set in DiscountTransfer::amount

  • Returns calculated amount.
calculate  
transformForPersistence  
transformFromPersistence  
getFormattedAmount  
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountCalculatorPluginInterface.php getAmountValidators  

Dependencies:

  • Application ^2.0.0
  • Gui ^2.2.0
  • Kernel ^2.0.0
  • Log ^2.0.0
  • Messenger ^2.0.0
  • Money ^1.0.0
  • Propel ^2.2.0
  • Sales ^2.0.0 || ^3.0.0
  • Symfony ^2.0.0
  • Transfer ^2.1.1
  • Url ^2.0.0

Suggested Installations:

 3.5.0

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
calculateDiscounts

  • Finds all discounts with voucher

  • Finds all discounts matching decision rules

  • Collects discountable items for each discount type

  • Applies discount to exclusive if exists

  • Distributes discount amount throw all discountable items

  • Adds discount totals to quote discount properties
isItemSkuSatisfiedBy

  • Checks if given item transfer matches clause
isQuoteGrandTotalSatisfiedBy

  • Checks if quote grand total matches clause
isTotalQuantitySatisfiedBy

  • Checks if cart total quantity matches clause
isSubTotalSatisfiedBy

  • Check quote subtotal matches clause
collectBySku

  • Collects all items match given sku in clause
isItemQuantitySatisfiedBy

  • Checks if item quantity matches clause
collectByItemQuantity

  • Collects all items match given quantity in clause
isItemPriceSatisfiedBy

  • Checks if there is items matching single item price in clause
collectByItemPrice

  • Collect all items matching given quantity in clause
isCalendarWeekSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current week in year matching clause
isDayOfTheWeekSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current day of the week is matching clause
isMonthSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current month is matching clause
isTimeSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current time matching clause
getQueryStringFieldsByType

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Collect all available fields from all registered plugins
getQueryStringFieldExpressionsForField

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Collect all available comparator operators for given fieldName
getQueryStringComparatorExpressions

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get all available comparators
getQueryStringLogicalComparators

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get boolean logical comparators
queryStringCompare

  • Given configure clause

  • Select comparator operator based on clause operator, execute it and return result.
validateQueryStringByType

  • Configure specification builder on type and query string

  • Try building query string

  • Store all occurred error to array and return it
saveDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return id of discount entity in persistence.
updateDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create/update voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return bool if discount entity was persisted
getHydratedDiscountConfiguratorByIdDiscount

  • Read idDiscount from persistence

  • Hydrate data from entities to DiscountConfiguratorTransfer

  • return DiscountConfiguratorTransfer
toggleDiscountVisibility

  • Find discount entity

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Persist
saveVoucherCodes

  • Find discount to which voucherCodes have to be generated

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Create pool if not created yet.

  • Using voucher engine generate voucherCodes by provided configuration from DiscountVoucherTransfer

  • Persist code with reference to current discount

  • Return VoucherCreateInfoTransfer with error or success messages if there was any
calculatePercentage

  • Loops over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sums each amount to to total

  • Rounds up cent fraction for total discount amount.

  • Returns total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculatePercentageDiscount

  • Loops over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sums each amount to to total

  • Rounds up cent fraction for total discount amount.

  • Returns total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculateFixed

  • Returns amount passed as parameter

  • Returns 0 if negative number is given
calculateFixedDiscount

  • Returns amount passed as parameter

  • Returns 0 if negative number is given
distributeAmount

  • Loops over each DiscountableItemTransfer and calculate each item price amount share from current discount total, for single item.

  • Calculates floating point error and store it for later item, add it to next item.

  • Stores item price share amount into DiscountableItemTransfer::originalItemCalculatedDiscounts array object reference. Points to original item.
releaseUsedVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Reduce voucher number of uses property by 1 to indicate it's not used/released.
useVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes finds all voucher entities with counter

  • Increments voucher number of uses property by 1.
saveOrderDiscounts

  • Loops over all quote items, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • Loops over all quote expenses, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • If there is voucher codes marks them as already used by incrementing number of uses.

  • Returns false when not matching.

  • For example product attributes. Uses one decision rules where available attributes will be provided by getAttributeTypes.

  • So you can filter by attribute.color = 'red' or attribute.brand = 'nike'. With same decision rule.

  • Calculate discount amount on given discountable items, which are collected by configured Collectors.

  • The discount amount is set in DiscountTransfer::amount

  • Returns calculated amount.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
isSatisfiedBy

  • Make decision on given Quote or Item transfer.

  • Use \Spryker\Zed\Discount\Business\QueryString\ComparatorOperatorsInterface to compare item value with ClauseTransfer.

  • Returns false when not matching.
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DecisionRulePluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)
collect

  • Collect items to which discount have to be applied, ClauseTransfer holds query string parameters,

  • Use \Spryker\Zed\Discount\Business\QueryString\ComparatorOperatorsInterface to compare item value with ClauseTransfer.

  • Returns array of discountable items with reference to original CalculatedDiscountTransfer, which is modified by reference by distributor.
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​CollectorPluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountRuleWithAttributesPluginInterface.php getAttributeTypes

  • Special rule type which allows expand available value list for decision or collector.

  • For example product attributes. Uses one decision rules where available attributes will be provided by getAttributeTypes.

  • So you can filter by attribute.color = 'red' or attribute.brand = 'nike'. With same decision rule.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountAmountCalculatorPluginInterface.php calculateDiscount

  • Calculate discount amount on given discountable items, which are collected by configured Collectors.

  • The discount amount is set in DiscountTransfer::amount

  • Returns calculated amount.

 3.4.2

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
calculateDiscounts

  • Finds all discounts with voucher

  • Finds all discounts matching decision rules

  • Collects discountable items for each discount type

  • Applies discount to exclusive if exists

  • Distributes discount amount throw all discountable items

  • Adds discount totals to quote discount properties

  • Using voucher engine generate voucherCodes by provided configuration from DiscountVoucherTransfer

  • Persist code with reference to current discount

  • Return VoucherCreateInfoTransfer with error or success messages if there was any
calculatePercentage

  • Loops over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sums each amount to to total

  • Rounds up cent fraction for total discount amount.

  • Returns total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculatePercentageDiscount

  • Loops over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sums each amount to to total

  • Rounds up cent fraction for total discount amount.

  • Returns total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculateFixed

  • Returns amount passed as parameter

  • Returns 0 if negative number is given
calculateFixedDiscount

  • Returns amount passed as parameter

  • Returns 0 if negative number is given
distributeAmount

  • Loops over each DiscountableItemTransfer and calculate each item price amount share from current discount total, for single item.

  • Calculates floating point error and store it for later item, add it to next item.

  • Stores item price share amount into DiscountableItemTransfer::originalItemCalculatedDiscounts array object reference. Points to original item.
releaseUsedVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Reduce voucher number of uses property by 1 to indicate it's not used/released.
useVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes finds all voucher entities with counter

  • Increments voucher number of uses property by 1.
saveOrderDiscounts

  • Loops over all quote items, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • Loops over all quote expenses, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • If there is voucher codes marks them as already used by incrementing number of uses.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
isSatisfiedBy

  • Make decision on given Quote or Item transfer.

  • Use \Spryker\Zed\Discount\Business\QueryString\ComparatorOperatorsInterface to compare item value with ClauseTransfer.

  • Returns false when not matching.
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DecisionRulePluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)
collect

  • Collect items to which discount have to be applied, ClauseTransfer holds query string parameters,

  • Use \Spryker\Zed\Discount\Business\QueryString\ComparatorOperatorsInterface to compare item value with ClauseTransfer.

  • Returns array of discountable items with reference to original CalculatedDiscountTransfer, which is modified by reference by distributor.
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​CollectorPluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountRuleWithAttributesPluginInterface.php getAttributeTypes

  • Special rule type which allows expand available value list for decision or collector.

  • For example product attributes. Uses one decision rules where available attributes will be provided by getAttributeTypes.

  • So you can filter by attribute.color = 'red' or attribute.brand = 'nike'. With same decision rule.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountAmountCalculatorPluginInterface.php calculateDiscount

  • Calculate discount amount on given discountable items, which are collected by configured Collectors.

  • The discount amount is set in DiscountTransfer::amount

  • Returns calculated amount.
calculate  
transformForPersistence  
transformFromPersistence  
getFormattedAmount  
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountCalculatorPluginInterface.php getAmountValidators  

Dependencies:

  • Application ^2.0.0
  • Gui ^2.2.0
  • Kernel ^2.0.0
  • Log ^2.0.0
  • Messenger ^2.0.0
  • Money ^1.0.0
  • Propel ^2.2.0
  • Sales ^2.0.0 || ^3.0.0
  • Symfony ^2.0.0
  • Transfer ^2.1.1
  • Url ^2.0.0

Suggested Installations:

 3.4.0

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
calculateDiscounts

  • Finds all discounts with voucher

  • Finds all discounts matching decision rules

  • Collects discountable items for each discount type

  • Applies discount to exclusive if exists

  • Distributes discount amount throw all discountable items

  • Adds discount totals to quote discount properties
isItemSkuSatisfiedBy

  • Checks if given item transfer matches clause
isQuoteGrandTotalSatisfiedBy

  • Checks if quote grand total matches clause
isTotalQuantitySatisfiedBy

  • Checks if cart total quantity matches clause
isSubTotalSatisfiedBy

  • Check quote subtotal matches clause
collectBySku

  • Collects all items match given sku in clause
isItemQuantitySatisfiedBy

  • Checks if item quantity matches clause
collectByItemQuantity

  • Collects all items match given quantity in clause
isItemPriceSatisfiedBy

  • Checks if there is items matching single item price in clause
collectByItemPrice

  • Collect all items matching given quantity in clause
isCalendarWeekSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current week in year matching clause
isDayOfTheWeekSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current day of the week is matching clause
isMonthSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current month is matching clause
isTimeSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current time matching clause
getQueryStringFieldsByType

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Collect all available fields from all registered plugins
getQueryStringFieldExpressionsForField

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Collect all available comparator operators for given fieldName
getQueryStringComparatorExpressions

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get all available comparators
getQueryStringLogicalComparators

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get boolean logical comparators
queryStringCompare

  • Given configure clause

  • Select comparator operator based on clause operator, execute it and return result.
validateQueryStringByType

  • Configure specification builder on type and query string

  • Try building query string

  • Store all occurred error to array and return it
saveDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return id of discount entity in persistence.
updateDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create/update voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return bool if discount entity was persisted
getHydratedDiscountConfiguratorByIdDiscount

  • Read idDiscount from persistence

  • Hydrate data from entities to DiscountConfiguratorTransfer

  • return DiscountConfiguratorTransfer
toggleDiscountVisibility

  • Find discount entity

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Persist
saveVoucherCodes

  • Find discount to which voucherCodes have to be generated

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Create pool if not created yet.

  • Using voucher engine generate voucherCodes by provided configuration from DiscountVoucherTransfer

  • Persist code with reference to current discount

  • Return VoucherCreateInfoTransfer with error or success messages if there was any
calculatePercentage

  • Loops over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sums each amount to to total

  • Rounds up cent fraction for total discount amount.

  • Returns total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculatePercentageDiscount

  • Loops over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sums each amount to to total

  • Rounds up cent fraction for total discount amount.

  • Returns total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculateFixed

  • Returns amount passed as parameter

  • Returns 0 if negative number is given
calculateFixedDiscount

  • Returns amount passed as parameter

  • Returns 0 if negative number is given
distributeAmount

  • Loops over each DiscountableItemTransfer and calculate each item price amount share from current discount total, for single item.

  • Calculates floating point error and store it for later item, add it to next item.

  • Stores item price share amount into DiscountableItemTransfer::originalItemCalculatedDiscounts array object reference. Points to original item.
releaseUsedVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Reduce voucher number of uses property by 1 to indicate it's not used/released.
useVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes finds all voucher entities with counter

  • Increments voucher number of uses property by 1.
saveOrderDiscounts

  • Loops over all quote items, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • Loops over all quote expenses, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • If there is voucher codes marks them as already used by incrementing number of uses.

queryStringCompare

  • Given configure clause

  • Select comparator operator based on clause operator, execute it and return result.
validateQueryStringByType

  • Configure specification builder on type and query string

  • Try building query string

  • Store all occurred error to array and return it
saveDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return id of discount entity in persistence.
updateDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create/update voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return bool if discount entity was persisted
getHydratedDiscountConfiguratorByIdDiscount

  • Read idDiscount from persistence

  • Hydrate data from entities to DiscountConfiguratorTransfer

  • return DiscountConfiguratorTransfer
toggleDiscountVisibility

  • Find discount entity

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Persist
saveVoucherCodes

  • Find discount to which voucherCodes have to be generated

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Create pool if not created yet.

  • Using voucher engine generate voucherCodes by provided configuration from DiscountVoucherTransfer

  • Persist code with reference to current discount

  • Return VoucherCreateInfoTransfer with error or success messages if there was any
calculatePercentage

  • Loop over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sum each amount to to total

  • Round up cent fraction for total discount amount!

  • Return total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculateFixed

  • Return amount passed as parameter,

  • Return 0 if negative number is given
distributeAmount

  • Loop over each DiscountableItemTransfer and calculate each item price amount share from current discount total, for single item.

  • Calculate floating point error and store it for later item, add it to next item.

  • Store item price share amount into DiscountableItemTransfer::originalItemCalculatedDiscounts array object reference! Which points to original item!
releaseUsedVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Reduce voucher number of uses property by 1 to indicate it's not used/released.
useVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Increment voucher number of uses property by 1.
saveOrderDiscounts

  • Loop over all quote items, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • Loop over all quote expenses, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • If there is voucher codes mark them as already used by incrementing number of uses.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
isSatisfiedBy  
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DecisionRulePluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)
calculate  
transformForPersistence  
transformFromPersistence  
getFormattedAmount  
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountCalculatorPluginInterface.php getAmountValidators  
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountRuleWithAttributesPluginInterface.php getAttributeTypes  
collect  
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​CollectorPluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)

Dependencies:

  • Application ^2.0.0
  • Gui ^2.2.0
  • Kernel ^2.0.0
  • Library ^2.0.0
  • Log ^2.0.0
  • Messenger ^2.0.0
  • Propel ^2.2.0
  • Sales ^2.0.0
  • Symfony ^2.0.0
  • Url ^2.0.0

Suggested Installations:

 3.1.4

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
calculateDiscounts

  • Find all discounts with voucher

  • Find all discounts matching decision rules

  • Collect discountable items for each discount type

  • Apply discount to exclusive if exists

  • distribute discount amount throw all discountable items

  • Add discount totals to quote discount properties
isItemSkuSatisfiedBy

  • Check if given item transfer matching clause
isQuoteGrandTotalSatisfiedBy

  • Check if quote grandTotal matching clause
isTotalQuantitySatisfiedBy

  • Check if cart total quantity matching clause
isSubTotalSatisfiedBy

  • Check quote subtotal matching clause
collectBySku

  • Collect all items matching given sku in clause
isItemQuantitySatisfiedBy

  • Check if item quantity matching clause
collectByItemQuantity

  • Collect all items matching given quantity in clause
isItemPriceSatisfiedBy

  • Check if there is items matching single item price in clause
collectByItemPrice

  • Collect all items matching given quantity in clause
isCalendarWeekSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current week in year matching clause
isDayOfTheWeekSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current day of the week is matching clause
isMonthSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current month is matching clause
isTimeSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current time matching clause
getQueryStringFieldsByType

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Collect all available fields from all registered plugins
getQueryStringFieldExpressionsForField

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Collect all available comparator operators for given fieldName
getQueryStringComparatorExpressions

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get all available comparators
getQueryStringLogicalComparators

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get boolean logical comparators
queryStringCompare

  • Given configure clause

  • Select comparator operator based on clause operator, execute it and return result.
validateQueryStringByType

  • Configure specification builder on type and query string

  • Try building query string

  • Store all occurred error to array and return it
saveDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return id of discount entity in persistence.
updateDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create/update voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return bool if discount entity was persisted
getHydratedDiscountConfiguratorByIdDiscount

  • Read idDiscount from persistence

  • Hydrate data from entities to DiscountConfiguratorTransfer

  • return DiscountConfiguratorTransfer
toggleDiscountVisibility

  • Find discount entity

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Persist
saveVoucherCodes

  • Find discount to which voucherCodes have to be generated

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Create pool if not created yet.

  • Using voucher engine generate voucherCodes by provided configuration from DiscountVoucherTransfer

  • Persist code with reference to current discount

  • Return VoucherCreateInfoTransfer with error or success messages if there was any
calculatePercentage

  • Loop over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sum each amount to to total

  • Round up cent fraction for total discount amount!

  • Return total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculateFixed

  • Return amount passed as parameter,

  • Return 0 if negative number is given
distributeAmount

  • Loop over each DiscountableItemTransfer and calculate each item price amount share from current discount total, for single item.

  • Calculate floating point error and store it for later item, add it to next item.

  • Store item price share amount into DiscountableItemTransfer::originalItemCalculatedDiscounts array object reference! Which points to original item!
releaseUsedVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Reduce voucher number of uses property by 1 to indicate it's not used/released.
useVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Increment voucher number of uses property by 1.
saveOrderDiscounts

  • Loop over all quote items, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • Loop over all quote expenses, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • If there is voucher codes mark them as already used by incrementing number of uses.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
isSatisfiedBy  
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DecisionRulePluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)
calculate  
transformForPersistence  
transformFromPersistence  
getFormattedAmount  
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountCalculatorPluginInterface.php getAmountValidators  
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountRuleWithAttributesPluginInterface.php getAttributeTypes  
collect  
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​CollectorPluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)

Dependencies:

  • Application ^2.0.0
  • Gui ^2.0.0
  • Kernel ^2.0.0
  • Library ^2.0.0
  • Log ^2.0.0
  • Messenger ^2.0.0
  • Propel ^2.2.0
  • Sales ^2.0.0
  • Symfony ^2.0.0
  • Url ^2.0.0

Suggested Installations:

 3.1.3

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
calculateDiscounts

  • Find all discounts with voucher

  • Find all discounts matching decision rules

  • Collect discountable items for each discount type

  • Apply discount to exclusive if exists

  • distribute discount amount throw all discountable items

  • Add discount totals to quote discount properties
isItemSkuSatisfiedBy

  • Check if given item transfer matching clause
isQuoteGrandTotalSatisfiedBy

  • Check if quote grandTotal matching clause
isTotalQuantitySatisfiedBy

  • Check if cart total quantity matching clause
isSubTotalSatisfiedBy

  • Check quote subtotal matching clause

isDayOfTheWeekSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current day of the week is matching clause
isMonthSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current month is matching clause
isTimeSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current time matching clause

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Collect all available fields from all registered plugins
getQueryStringFieldExpressionsForField

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Collect all available comparator operators for given fieldName
getQueryStringComparatorExpressions

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get all available comparators
getQueryStringLogicalComparators

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get boolean logical comparators
queryStringCompare

  • Given configure clause

  • Select comparator operator based on clause operator, execute it and return result.
validateQueryStringByType

  • Configure specification builder on type and query string

  • Try building query string

  • Store all occurred error to array and return it
saveDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return id of discount entity in persistence.
updateDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create/update voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return bool if discount entity was persisted
getHydratedDiscountConfiguratorByIdDiscount

  • Read idDiscount from persistence

  • Hydrate data from entities to DiscountConfiguratorTransfer

  • return DiscountConfiguratorTransfer
toggleDiscountVisibility

  • Find discount entity

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Persist
saveVoucherCodes

  • Find discount to which voucherCodes have to be generated

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Create pool if not created yet.

  • Using voucher engine generate voucherCodes by provided configuration from DiscountVoucherTransfer

  • Persist code with reference to current discount

  • Return VoucherCreateInfoTransfer with error or success messages if there was any
calculatePercentage

  • Loop over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sum each amount to to total

  • Round up cent fraction for total discount amount!

  • Return total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculateFixed

  • Return amount passed as parameter,

  • Return 0 if negative number is given
distributeAmount

  • Loop over each DiscountableItemTransfer and calculate each item price amount share from current discount total, for single item.

  • Calculate floating point error and store it for later item, add it to next item.

  • Store item price share amount into DiscountableItemTransfer::originalItemCalculatedDiscounts array object reference! Which points to original item!
releaseUsedVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Reduce voucher number of uses property by 1 to indicate it's not used/released.
useVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Increment voucher number of uses property by 1.
saveOrderDiscounts

  • Loop over all quote items, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • Loop over all quote expenses, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • If there is voucher codes mark them as already used by incrementing number of uses.

  • Store item price share amount into DiscountableItemTransfer::originalItemCalculatedDiscounts array object reference! Which points to original item!

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Reduce voucher number of uses property by 1 to indicate it's not used/released.

releaseUsedVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Reduce voucher number of uses property by 1 to indicate it's not used/released.
useVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Increment voucher number of uses property by 1.
saveOrderDiscounts

  • Loop over all quote items, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • Loop over all quote expenses, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • If there is voucher codes mark them as already used by incrementing number of uses.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
collect  
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​CollectorPluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)
isSatisfiedBy  
getFieldName

Name of field as used in query string
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DecisionRulePluginInterface.php acceptedDataTypes

Data types used by this field. (string, integer, list)
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountRuleWithAttributesPluginInterface.php getAttributeTypes  
calculate  
transformForPersistence  
transformFromPersistence  
getFormattedAmount  
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountCalculatorPluginInterface.php getAmountValidators  

Dependencies:

  • Application ^2.0.0
  • Gui ^2.0.0
  • Kernel ^2.0.0
  • Library ^2.0.0
  • Messenger ^2.0.0
  • Propel ^2.2.0
  • Sales ^2.0.0
  • Symfony ^2.0.0
  • Url ^2.0.0

Suggested Installations:

 3.0.1

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
calculateDiscounts

  • Find all discounts with voucher

  • Find all discounts matching decision rules

  • Collect discountable items for each discount type

  • Apply discount to exclusive if exists

  • distribute discount amount throw all discountable items

  • Add discount totals to quote discount properties
isItemSkuSatisfiedBy

  • Check if given item transfer matching clause
isQuoteGrandTotalSatisfiedBy

  • Check if quote grandTotal matching clause
isTotalQuantitySatisfiedBy

  • Check if cart total quantity matching clause
isSubTotalSatisfiedBy

  • Check quote subtotal matching clause
collectBySku

  • Collect all items matching given sku in clause
isItemQuantitySatisfiedBy

  • Check if item quantity matching clause
collectByItemQuantity

  • Collect all items matching given quantity in clause
isItemPriceSatisfiedBy

  • Check if there is items matching single item price in clause
collectByItemPrice

  • Collect all items matching given quantity in clause
isCalendarWeekSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current week in year matching clause
isDayOfTheWeekSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current day of the week is matching clause
isMonthSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current month is matching clause
isTimeSatisfiedBy

  • Check if current time matching clause
getQueryStringFieldsByType

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Collect all available fields from all registered plugins
getQueryStringFieldExpressionsForField

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Collect all available comparator operators for given fieldName
getQueryStringComparatorExpressions

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get all available comparators
getQueryStringLogicalComparators

  • Given type look for meta data provider

  • Get boolean logical comparators
queryStringCompare

  • Given configure clause

  • Select comparator operator based on clause operator, execute it and return result.
validateQueryStringByType

  • Configure specification builder on type and query string

  • Try building query string

  • Store all occurred error to array and return it
saveDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return id of discount entity in persistence.
updateDiscount

  • Hydrate discount entity from DiscountConfiguratorTransfer and persist it.

  • If discount type is voucher create/update voucher pool without voucherCodes

  • Return bool if discount entity was persisted
getHydratedDiscountConfiguratorByIdDiscount

  • Read idDiscount from persistence

  • Hydrate data from entities to DiscountConfiguratorTransfer

  • return DiscountConfiguratorTransfer
toggleDiscountVisibility

  • Find discount entity

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Persist
saveVoucherCodes

  • Find discount to which voucherCodes have to be generated

  • Change discount state to enabled/disabled.

  • Create pool if not created yet.

  • Using voucher engine generate voucherCodes by provided configuration from DiscountVoucherTransfer

  • Persist code with reference to current discount

  • Return VoucherCreateInfoTransfer with error or success messages if there was any
calculatePercentage

  • Loop over all discountable items and calculate discount price amount per item

  • Sum each amount to to total

  • Round up cent fraction for total discount amount!

  • Return total calculated discount amount on given discountable items
calculateFixed

  • Return amount passed as parameter,

  • Return 0 if negative number is given
distributeAmount

  • Loop over each DiscountableItemTransfer and calculate each item price amount share from current discount total, for single item.

  • Calculate floating point error and store it for later item, add it to next item.

  • Store item price share amount into DiscountableItemTransfer::originalItemCalculatedDiscounts array object reference! Which points to original item!
releaseUsedVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Reduce voucher number of uses property by 1 to indicate it's not used/released.
useVoucherCodes

  • For given voucherCodes find all voucher entities with counter

  • Increment voucher number of uses property by 1.
saveOrderDiscounts

  • Loop over all quote items, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • Loop over all quote expenses, take calculated discounts and persist them discount amount is for single item

  • If there is voucher codes mark them as already used by incrementing number of uses.

transformForPersistence  
transformFromPersistence  
getFormattedAmount  
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Discount/​Dependency/​Plugin/​DiscountCalculatorPluginInterface.php getAmountValidators
